trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for operations that match string patterns.
Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before and following it.
The string to insert into the search pattern string.
The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
A search pattern string that contains the specified string and the '%' character before and after it.
Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before it but not following it.
The string to insert into the search pattern string.
The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
A search pattern string that contains the '%' character followed by the specified string.
Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text after it but not before it.
The string to insert into the search pattern string.
The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
A search pattern string that contains the specified string followed by the '%' character.

Translates a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> operator to a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> operator.

The [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> search pattern to translate to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> search pattern.
The character to use to escape special SQL characters or the escape character itself.

A search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> operator that corresponds to the specified [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> search pattern.
